name: Duck Duck Goose (itch) (Charlie Gray)
description:
Entry for the 76th Trijam. The Theme is: Imposters.

The Duck Mall opens its doors for the day and ducks stream into the entrance to do their shopping.

With the ducks also come geese that want to profit from the huge supply and cheap prices. But they are not welcome here.

And so it is your job to keep all geese out of the mall. You are monitoring the entrance hall and need to spot every goose that tries to sneak in.

And, yeah. I know ducks aren't normally that color...

Source Code: https://github.com/TLochow/Duck-Duck-Goose
